channel.title: 2 questions about npc's
channel.description:
2 questions about npc's
one, is one of my shops, i trade him and i get like 12 different items i like. but if i talk to him, i get like 4 other items i want, how do i fix
two, is how do i remove the npc id next to my npc's?
thanks
